Self Signed Certs

October 02, 2015

Generate a self signed certiicate:

openssl genrsa -des3 -passout pass:x -out server.pass.key 2048 openssl rsa -passin pass:x -in server.pass.key -out server.key openssl req -new -key server.key -out server.csr openssl x509 -req -sha256 -days 365 -in server.csr -signkey server.key -out server.crt

Contact Dark/Light
